biotools.summary:
The NEW ESID online database network.

European Society for Immunodeficiencies.

Exchange of ideas and information among doctors, nurses, biomedical investigators, patients and their families concerned with primary immunodeficiency diseases (PID).

ESID Registry (click to go to ESID Registry login page).

In 2018, the ESID Registry WP renewed its call to support national registries and individual documenting centres in your invaluable work associated with the documentation within the ESID Registry.
